name: Bumping Bumpy Bumper Boats
description:
You are at the whims of the great ocean and you're surrounded by enemies.

Put that keyboard away, it's of no use on a boat, silly! The one consolidation is that you remembered to bring your handy mouse-controlled cannon along.

Submit yourself to the raging sea!  

---

Controls:

  1. Use mouse to aim and shoot. Get points!
  2. That's it. The rest is out of your control.

---

Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2020 - Out of Control
